About Me

A little bit about me

I am from Rewari(Haryana) and currently I am pursuing my Bachelor's of Engineering from Chandigarh University with specialization in Internet of Things currently I am in my 8th semester and an intern in Tec-Elit company!


My Projects

Twitter Sentiment Analysis

Process of computationally identifying and categorizing opinions from a piece of text and determine whether a writer's attitude towards a particular topic or product is positive , negative or neutral.

See Project
Chess board with AI

Chess is a two-player strategy board game played on a chessboard, a checkered game board with 64 squares arranged in an 8×8 grid. The game is played by millions of People worldwide, but in this project we will play chess on our laptop or mobile with anyother person or with Artificial Intelligence.

See Project
Traffic Monitoring

Trafﬁc congestion in cities is a major problem mainly in developingcountries; to encounter this, many models of trafﬁc system have been proposed bydifferent scholars. Different ways have been proposed to make the trafﬁc systemsmarter, reliable, and robust. A model is also proposed which uses infrared proximity sensors and a centrallyplaced microcontroller and uses vehicular length along a length to implementintelligent trafﬁc monitoring system.

See Project
